column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ Aaron na se no dɛ
column6: nkandzea esuon no ngyegye kandzeadua no enyim."

column2: "Na Aaron yɛɛ dɛm; ɔsosɔɔ ne nkandzea ma ɔgyegyee kandzeadua no enyim
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses no."

column2: "Na iyi nye kandzeadua no ne yɛbea
column3: sika a ɔabor ara nko; fi n’ase dze kodu ne nhyiren do nyinara yɛ ɔbor edwuma: dɛ mbrɛ nsusudo a EWURADZE dze kyerɛɛ Moses no tse no

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
"Dɛm na yɛ hɔn fa tsew hɔn ho: fa bɔnyi ho nsu petse hɔn do
column3: na ma wɔmfa oyindam nyiyi hɔnho nyinara
column4: na ma wɔnhor hɔn ntar mfa ntsew hɔnho."

column2: "Nna ma wɔmfa ɔnantwisaa eburwa
column4: isiam pa a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column5: na fa ɔnantwisaa eburwa kor so bɔ bɔn ho afɔr."

column2: "Na fa Levifo no bra ehyiadzibuw no enyim: na ma Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara mbɔbɔ ngua:"
"na fa Levifo no bra EWURADZE enyim: na Israelmba mfa hɔn nsa ngu Levifo no do."
"Afei Aaron ntu Levifo no nsi hɔ dɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: ma wɔntsena hɔ nyɛ EWURADZE n’edwuma."

column2: "Na Levifo no mfa hɔn nsa ngu anantwisaa no etsifi: na fa kor bɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column3: na fa kor so bɔ ɔhyew afɔr ma EWURADZE
column4: ma ɔnyɛ mpata mma Levifo no."

column2: "Na fa Levifo no gyina Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no enyim
column3: na tu hɔn si hɔ dɛ ɔtow afɔr ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Dɛm na tsew Levifo no fi Israelmba mu: na Levifo no mbɛyɛ medze."
"Na n’ekyir no Levifo no nkɔ nkɛyɛ ehyiadzibuw no ho edwuma: na tsew hɔn ho
column3: na tu hɔn si hɔ dɛ ɔtow afɔr."

column2: "Osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn ama me koraa efi Israelmba no mu; medze hɔn ahyɛ dza obue yafun nyinara
column3: mekyerɛ Israelmba mu mbakan nyinara ananmu mafa."

column2: "Na Israelmba mu mbakan nyinara yɛ medze
column3: nyimpa nye mbowa nyina da a mobobɔɔ Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara no na metseew hɔn ho maa moho."

column2: "Na mafa Levifo no ahyɛ Israelmba mu mbakan nyinara ananmu."
"Na medze Levifo no ama Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ akyɛdze a ofi Israelmba mu dɛ wɔnyɛ edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column3: na wɔmpata mma Israelmba ama sɛ Israelmba no rotwe bɛn ahotseweebea no a
column4: ɔyardɔm bi aammba Israelmba no mu."

column2: "Dɛm na Moses
column5: yɛɛ Levifo no. Dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses wɔ Levifo no ho nyinara no
column6: dɛmara na Israelmba no yɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na Levifo no tseew hɔnho fii bɔn ho
column3: na wɔhoor hɔn ntar; na Aaron tuu hɔn sii hɔ yɛɛ ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim; na Aaron patae maa hɔn dze tseew hɔn ho."

column2: "Na n’ekyir no Levifo no kɔree kɛyɛɛ hɔn edwuma wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu wɔ Aaron
column3: nye ne mbabanyin no enyim: na dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses wɔ Levifo no ho no

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Dza ɔyɛ Levifo dze no nye yi: hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonu enum nye ekyir no nkɔ nkɔsom wɔ ehyiadzibuw no edwuma no mu:"

column2: "na ofi hɔn a woedzi mfe eduonum do no ngyaa edwuma yɛ
"mbom wɔnye hɔn nuanom nsom wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column4: na ɔsom edwuma no na mma wɔnnyɛ. Dɛm na yɛ ma Levifo no wɔ hɔn ahwɛdodze ho afamu."
